select count(*) from basket where userno = #{userno} and objectno = #{objectno}
mapper.update: update basket set quantity = #{quantity} where userno = #{userno} and objectno = #{objectno}
mapper.select: select a.* ,b.* from basket a inner join shop b on a.objectno = b.objectno where userno = ${userno}
mapper.insert: insert into orderuser(buyno, buyername, buyeradd, buyerzip, buyerphone, complete, userno, buydate, buydetailaddress) values(#{buyno}, #{buyername}, #{buyeradd}, #{buyerzip}, #{buyerphone}, 'n', #{userno}, current_date, #{buydetailaddress})
insert into OrderThing(buylistno, quantity, objectno, buyno) values(SEQ_ORDERTHING.nextval, #{quantity}, #{objectno}, #{buyno})
mapper.select: select * from basket where userno = #{userno} and objectno = #{objectno}

select a.buyno, a.buyername, a.buyeradd, a.buyerzip, a.buyerphone, a.complete, a.userno, a.buydetailaddress , b.*, c.name, c.price, to_char(a.buydate,'yyyy/MM/DD HH:MI') as buydate from orderuser a , shop c, orderthing b WHERE a.buyno = b.buyno AND userno = #{userno} AND c.objectno = b.objectno ORDER BY buydate DESC
